original_text: And all the people went their way to eat, and to drink, and to send portions, and to make great mirth, because they had understood the words that were declared unto them.
korean_text: 모든 백성이 곧 가서 먹고 마시며 나누어 주고 크게 즐거워하니 이는 그들이 그 읽어 들려 준 말을 밝히 앎이라

sentences.original_text: And all the people went their way to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 백성은 먹으러 가는 길을 갔고

sentences.original_text: because they had understood the words
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 그 말씀들을 깨달았기 때문입니다
